about_the_game: Created by RDGsoundFX, this library features growls, hisses, roars, screeches, and much more of creepy and imaginative, alien-like creatures. Includes 242 sounds that are the perfect companion for SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.
detailed_description: Created by RDGsoundFX, this library features growls, hisses, roars, screeches, and much more of creepy and imaginative, alien-like creatures. Includes 242 sounds that are the perfect companion for SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.
legal_notice:
*Cakewalk Loop Manager is designed and tested to be compatible with STEAM installations of Music Creator and SONAR. Other SONAR or Music Creator configurations/installations are not officially supported.
**Cakewalk Loop Manager should be installed to the same STEAM Library that you have Music Creator and/or SONAR installed to for proper operation.
***Cakewalk Loop Manager does not need Music Creator or SONAR installed to be utilized.
name: Sound FX: Creatures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1 or Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080 recommended)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Connection required for downloads

short_description: Created by RDGsoundFX, this library features growls, hisses, roars, screeches, and much more of creepy and imaginative, alien-like creatures.
